on sheet in black: [JOHN BOTH/ Willers pinxit  Corner Inc't/ Published for the Proprietor, according to the Act of Parliament, Jan'y 1, 1816/ by Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme & Brown; & Lackington, Allen, &Co./ London]
